metadata.feature_description: Generate RSS feed for activity stream content

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Generate RSS feed for user profile

steps.action: Navigate to Activity Feed page for user profile
steps.expected: Activity Feed page loads with posts and RSS icon visible
steps.actual: Activity Feed page loaded successfully showing user activity stream with RSS icon at bottom

steps.action: Scroll down to locate RSS feed icon
steps.expected: RSS icon should be visible near the activity stream footer
steps.actual: RSS icon (small gray RSS symbol) visible near 'Get More' button at bottom of activity stream

steps.action: Click on RSS feed icon to generate feed
steps.expected: RSS feed should open in new tab with valid XML content
steps.actual: RSS feed opened in new tab displaying valid RSS 2.0 XML with activity stream items

steps.expected: Feed should be valid RSS 2.0 format with channel, items, title, description, pubDate elements
steps.actual: RSS feed contains valid RSS 2.0 structure: <rss version='2.0'>, <channel> with title 'My Website Most recent journals', <language>en-US</language>, <pubDate>, <lastBuildDate>, <generator>Journal RSS Generator Version 10.1.1.85</generator>, and multiple <item> elements with title, description, author, comments, pubDate

steps.action: Navigate to Group Activity page (Test Activity Group)
steps.expected: Group Activity page loads with group-specific posts and RSS icon
steps.actual: Group Activity page loaded successfully showing group activity stream with RSS icon visible

steps.action: Click on RSS feed icon to generate group feed
steps.expected: Group RSS feed should open with group-specific activity content
steps.actual: Group RSS feed opened in new tab displaying valid RSS 2.0 XML with group-specific activity items including posts and wiki articles. Channel link points to Community/Groups/Activity

observations: RSS feed icon uses class 'journal-social-rss' with background image from Images/rss.png
RSS feeds open in new browser tab (target='_blank') when clicked
RSS feed URL format for user profile: /Activity-Feed/view/rssfeed
RSS feed URL format for groups: /Community/Groups/Activity/view/rssfeed/groupId/{id}
RSS feeds include wiki articles, posts, photos and other activity types with appropriate metadata
